name: Plutto
headline: Verify and validate business customers in minutes for LatAm.
description: Plutto gathers all the information and documents needed to verify and identify any business in LatAm. We process this information and provide insights to your on-boarding or compliance teams so they can make better decisions. This increases on-boarding speed from weeks to minutes and automates highly manual processes such as requesting and reading documents.

founders.name: Antonia San Martin, Founder
founders.description:
Worked at Heineken and Nike.
Co-founded a travel startup for 1 year.
Now I’m CEO @ Plutto, building verification service for businesses in Latin America.

founders.name: Felipe Domínguez, Founder
founders.description:
Fullstack Dev for some years, now co-founder @ Plutto. 
I spend a lot of time in the mountains.

founders.name: Ignacio Márquez, Founder
founders.description:
Graduated as Software Engineer. Worked a couple years as a full-stack developer and scrum master in Platanus, Chile. Co-founded a travel startup for 1 year.

Now I'm CTO @ Plutto, building KYB solutions for Latin America.

## Descubre nuestras soluciones
Incorporación y gestión empresarial más ágil e inteligente.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660742262fd7dee4356aba1_Vendor%20due%20diligence.svg.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/667db4b2442a1fda316c4ade_vendor.svg)
Gestión de Proveedores
Equipos de Adquisiciones, Auditoría y Legal.
Automatiza la gestión del riesgo con evaluaciones detalladas, en línea con el cumplimiento regulatorio.
[Conoce más](https://getplutto.com/</vendor>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/66607422c7daecc640787908_KYB-Home.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/667db49f188c65ef82927f3a_kyb.svg)
Gestión de Clientes
Equipos de Finanzas, Contratos y Comercial.
Automatiza las verificaciones y procesos de onboarding con medidas anti-fraude.
[Conoce más ](https://getplutto.com/</kyb>)
Know Your Business (KYB)
For Banks and Financial Institutions
Automate compliance with regulatory standards, ensure accuracy and detail during verifications
[Learn More ](https://getplutto.com/<#>)
Vendor Due Diligence
For Procurement and Legal Managers
Automate and manage risk with detailed, real-time vendor assessments
[Learn More ](https://getplutto.com/<#>)
[Agenda una demo](https://getplutto.com/<#contact>)
##  Descubre como centralizar y optimizar laGestión de Terceros
Centraliza +20 fuentes de datos Públicas
Accede a una visión completa, desde aspectos legales, financieros y de cumplimiento, realizando **análisis de riesgo** en cuestión de segundos.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6675ffdcc9cbb825baa7717e_fuentes%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6676050dc142b79bf6449278_Copilots%20\(2\).png)
Lectura documental inteligente 
Optimiza la revisión de documentos con **Co-Pilotos IA,** verificando y creando alertas preventivas en **menos de 60 segundos.**
Monitoreo automático de cartera
Programa **seguimientos periódicos** de los cambios que puedan afectar los riesgos de tu portafolio.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660758dc014867fd62cac36_Portfolio%20Risk%20Monitoring.png)
## Alertas automáticas para revisiones de cumplimiento
Reduce hasta un 80% la carga operativa con nuestra herramienta tecnológica basada en **Inteligencia Artificial**

## Descubre nuestras industrias
Optimiza la debida diligencia para una incorporación y monitoreo empresarial más inteligente y rápido
[Agendar una demo](https://getplutto.com/<#contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660778af5cb15d2592d7685_65988b609b128e0da45e1b99_bancos.svg)
Bancos
Garantiza operaciones financieras seguras para el leasing y el factoring. Verifica la identidad de tus clientes y acelera el proceso de incorporación.
![columns on montreal buildingby Etienne Martin](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1501167786227-4cba60f6d58f?ixid=M3w0ODMyOTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxfHxiYW5rfGVufDB8fHx8MTcxNzU1MTA1Nnww&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&fit=clamp&auto=format&w=600)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/668568947457182d4386fd20_Group%201597878804.png)
Salmonera
Optimiza la precalificación, gestión, monitoreo y evaluación de desempeño de tus proveedores. Asegura calidad y eficiencia de tus operaciones.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/668567429e9ee0c0dc3dc9fe_salmonera.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6685689d83e5240c6fcc0127_Group%201597878806.png)
Logística
Automatiza la precalificación de proveedores y la gestión de contratistas para maximizar la eficiencia operativa y reducir riesgos en la cadena de suministro.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/66856752ffbb55b373446342_logistica.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660778afec36fa04d475e24_65988b609b128e0da45e1b9b_inmobiliaria.svg)
Inmobiliarias
Automatiza la revisión integral de antecedentes y evaluación financiera de clientes, controla cambios y recibe alertas preventivas.
![aerial photography of ruralby Breno Assis](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1516156008625-3a9d6067fab5?ixid=M3w0ODMyOTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwyfHxlc3RhdGV8ZW58MHx8fHwxNzE3NTk4NzgyfDA&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&fit=clamp&auto=format&w=600)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6678c3bca7b2cc04cf0e3797_mineria.png)
Minería
Reduce el riesgo de la tercerización, optimizando el control laboral y asegurando el cumplimiento de las obligaciones laborales de tus contratistas.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6678c1bbd6ce6d1128791b7b_Frame%201597878939.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660778a969e6361c2beab6d_65988b609b128e0da45e1b9c_auto.svg)
Automotriz
Automatiza tus procesos y desbloquea capital de forma más rápida para leasing operativo, renting y rent a car.
![Road Warriorby Evgeny Tchebotarev](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493238792000-8113da705763?ixid=M3w0ODMyOTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxM3x8Y2FyfGVufDB8fHx8MTcxNzU5OTAxMXww&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&fit=clamp&auto=format&w=600)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660778a2a2c9b02ba490dbe_65988b609b128e0da45e1ba0_telecomunicaciones.svg)
Telco
Impulsa tus ventas B2B automatizando la revisión y recopilación de información, reduciendo riesgos y mejorando conversiones..
![red and white tower under white skyby rivage](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1614484690770-f69bee4de082?ixid=M3w0ODMyOTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxNHx8VGVsZWNvbW11bmljYXRpb25zfGVufDB8fHx8MTcxNzU5OTEyOHww&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&fit=clamp&auto=format&w=600)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6678c47fd6ce6d11287aa487_energia.png)
Energía
Agiliza la evaluación de proveedores. Analiza el riesgo y el cumplimiento normativo desde un mismo lugar, y lleva un control integral para prevenir riesgos
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6678c4dc2d43bcfa421f14ba_energia%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660778ab59f6aefb78bb024_65988b609b128e0da45e1b9f_financial.svg)
Instituciones Financeras
Facilita operaciones financieras seguras. Evalúa el riesgo financiero y de crédito de tus clientes, y mantén un seguimiento activo de la salud de tu cartera.
![Technology share chartby Markus Winkler](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1591696205602-2f950c417cb9?ixid=M3w0ODMyOTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHw5fHxmaW5hbmNlfGVufDB8fHx8MTcxNzU5ODg1M3ww&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&fit=clamp&auto=format&w=600)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663b7354b18c8528d3f9a8d6/6660778ac014867fd62e81f3_65988b609b128e0da45e1b9a_fintech.svg)
Fintech
Automatiza KYB para un crecimiento seguro: verifica autenticidad, minimiza riesgos y evita fraudes antes de operar.

generated_description:
**Plutto: Revolutionizing Business Verification in Latin America**

Founded in 2022 and nestled in the vibrant city of Santiago, Chile, Plutto is poised to transform how businesses in Latin America get verified and validated. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, this fintech company is on a mission to streamline processes, reducing onboarding times from weeks to mere minutes. 

Plutto offers a smart solution by gathering all the essential information and documents to verify business identities. It processes this data efficiently, providing critical insights to compliance and onboarding teams—empowering them to make informed decisions quickly. This automation decreases the tedious, manual workload associated with document handling. 

With a team of 12 dedicated employees led by Group Partner Brad Flora, Plutto is rapidly making a name for itself as the #1 provider in B2B evaluations across LATAM for 2023. They focus on sectors ranging from banking to retail, impacting how businesses manage supplier and client verification through their technology-driven approach. 

The services encompass various features such as vendor due diligence, Know Your Business (KYB) compliance for banks, and automatic alerts for risk assessment, all utilizing advanced AI capabilities. Their platform boasts a significant reduction in operational workload—up to 80%—which translates to fantastic efficiency for organizations navigating the complexity of compliance.

Clients are already singing their praises, citing significant time savings and enhanced operational workflows. Plutto not only simplifies the due diligence process but also enables businesses to manage risk better without the hassle of overwhelming manual work.

For those interested in transforming their verification processes and enhancing business efficiency, you can find more about Plutto at [getplutto.com](https://getplutto.com).

In summary, Plutto stands as an inspiring example of how fintech can be harnessed to provide robust, quick, and reliable validation solutions in the dynamic landscape of Latin American business.
